content: create a truly customisable christmas stocking for everyone this yea﻿r with a simple granny stitch design the detail is in the colour with this one keep it simple and neutral or go for it with a rainbow - the choice is yours > available as part of the very merry > tweedmas crochet along beginning 6th > december 2023 join us here 1 **what s included ** a 14-page pdf including written pattern in us terms stitch tutorial yarn alternatives colour charts schematic and customisation information pattern support of you need or would like it difficulty is easy full video tutorial **materials and tools ** hook 4 5mm g+ crochet hook 2 or size needed to meet gauge yarn shown in brava tweed worsted 3 by wecrochet 97% premium acrylic 3% viscose 218yds/200m/100g sizing 6 75 wide x 19 25 at longest point but is easily adjustable for the length of toe and leg **yarn quantities ** each stocking requires 610yds/560m of yarn full information on yarn quantities for different colour options give within pattern **gauge ** 9 rounds and 14sts of double_crochet = 4 x 4 10cm x 10cm please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out you are welcome to use this pattern for personal use to make and sell your finished items on a small scale credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated i d love you to join me at www hanjancrochet com 4 and share my free patterns and tutorials with you - technical information file format this crochet pattern is provided as a digital pdf file only no physical copy of the pattern or finished item will be supplied by purchasing and downloading this pattern you agree to the following below file size under 20mb device/software compatibility compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers internet requirements an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase usage instructions download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section - usage instructions complete your purchase on this platform download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions required tools see materials needed - safety and compliance compliance this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr and other applicable eu directives precautions not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase disclaimer this product is for educational and personal use only - refund policy this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued please review all product details before purchase disclaimer for use this pattern is provided as is without any guarantees or warranty in connection with the use of the
